Cookbook: Integrating IPDR monitoring
[Cookbook: Integration issues]

The IPDR transmitter (client) provides three basic mechanisms for monitoring it:
  • Statistics and status call (IPDR_GetServerStatisticsAndState(), IPDR_GetSessionStatistics()).
  • Log (both to file/console and in syslog format [RFC 3164 http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3164.txt]).
  • SNMP MIB (see also Cookbook: Integrating the IPDR MIB).

In addition, if the console is enabled (configuration.console.consolePort (default port 40000), you can connect via ordinary telnet to examine things.
